data.title: Highdata Software
data.text:
Career Benefits

Highdata is an equal opportunity employer. Apart from competitive salaries, bonuses and incentives, we offer accelerated growth potential better than large corporations.

We strongly believe that employees are our most cherished assets. Our best-in-class work environment with global work culture emphasizes this. Highdata offers its employees many opportunities to update skill sets and knowledge for their own career advancements. Our employee compensation and incentives packages are tailored to foster the growth of employee's professional and personal goals.

Visa/Green card Processing

Health Insurance

Highdata provides comprehensive general health insurance coverage for the employees and their families and enable them to access range of health care at lower out-of-pocket costs. Our group plan has HMO, PPO and HRA plans with different options on the health insurance coverage for all eligible employees. Eligible employees often choose to opt for conversion from other health plans to Highdata's group health insurance plans.

Dental Insurance

Highdata provides dental insurance benefits to the employees.

Life Insurance

Highdata provides life insurance coverage for its employees.

Disability Insurance

Total protection is ensured for the employees by providing long-term disability insurance.

401 K Plan

Highdata offers a 401 (K) plan for employees to save for their retirement. Eligible Employees can port their previous portfolios with Highdata's group 401k plan.

Employee Referral Scheme

To attract the best talent in the industry, we encourage employees to refer professionals, for which they are suitably rewarded through a defined system of incentives.

Paid Time Off

Employees are eligible for 17 Paid Time Off days a year.

Compensation

We always attract and reward high performers with a comprehensive salary offering with the right mix of personal benefits. Over the years we have added many promising professionals to our team. This would not have been possible without an attractive pay structure, benefits packages and stimulating work environment.
